alert.note: Alert for North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 3:18PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Lake County through 345 PM CDT... At 317 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Boundary Waters Canoe Area Wilderness, to Ely, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Fall Lake around 330 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Forest Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake
